messages.name: Bog
messages.message:
Happy Anniversary Polka!!!

Its been a quick year for the circus! I cannot wait for what's to come!
I have recently started learning Japanese in order to be able to chat during your streams. Ill do my best!
Your message of keep smiling regardless of what problems you face has helped me through the rough times of late, so for that thank you!

Sincerely,

Luke

messages.name: Rinri
